WithCaller(String, String, String, String, String, Int32)

Builds a log file path with caller information.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description

The type of log to create.

The session root directory.
System.String exeAssembly

The name of executing assembly.
System.String callPath

The filename of where the log is coming from.

The method name of where the log is coming from.
